lead_paragraph: MOSER--Judith S.,86, of Pawlet, VT, died May 13, 2016 at the Rutland Regional Medical Center. She was born July 8, 1929 in West Orange, NJ, the daughter of Charles Lewis and Anna (Toomey) Schweinler. The widow of Harry V. Moser, Jr., she graduated from Convent of the Sacred Heart in Greenwich, CT and Trinity College in Washington, DC. She is survived by her children, M. Chris Moser of Little Falls, NJ and M. Beth Moser-Duquette and husband, Raymond, Sr. of West Pawlet, VT; two grandchildren, McKayla M. Kashner and Nicholas V. Kashner. Instead of a gathering funeral, her family and friends are asked to go to their own worship places and express their gratitude to God for all the amazing people that God put in her wonderful life to give her all the support and care through the years; and the truth, goodness and beauty God has shown her. She also asks for prayers for her children and grandchildren that God would meet their needs. Mrs. Moser was predeceased by a son, Henry V. Moser III. Private burial will be held in Restland Memorial Park in East Hanover, NJ. Memorial contributions may be made to Rutland Area Visiting Nurse Association & Hospice, 7 Albert Cree Drive, Rutland, VT 05701, or Carmelite Monastery, 189 Madison Avenue, Morristown, NJ 07960. Services are under the direction of Tossing Funeral Home. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MOSER, JUDITH S.
